title.narrative: Monitoring av Offentlig Finansiell Styrning Liberia

description.narrative:
Insatsen syftar till att genom en teknisk konsult stödja ambassaden i uppföljningen av ambassadens PFM-insatser.
Det tekniska stödet som konsulten kommer att ge inkludera följande:
1) Stödja ambassadens beredning och uppföljning av insatsen Integrated Public Financial Management Reform Project II.
2) Stödja ambassadens i uppföljningen av insatsen Overseas Development Institute’s budgetförstärkningsinitiativ i Liberia.
3) Stödja ambassadens beredning och uppföljning av insatsen med Skatteverket och Liberia Revenue Authority (LRA).
Syftet är också att bygga en ram för analys och lärande, d.v.s. att följa upp resultat och risker på olika nivåer i insatserna samt att föreslå justeringar på insats- och policynivå.

The contribution aims to support the embassy in the follow-up of the Embassy's PFM-contributions through a technical consultant.
The technical support that the consultant will provide will include the following:
1) Support the Embassy in appraising and follow-up of the Integrated Public Financial Management Reform Project II.
2) Support the Embassy in the follow-up of the intervention Overseas Development Institute's budget strengthening initiative in Liberia.
3) Support the Embassy in appraising and follow-up of the contribution with the Swedish Tax Authority and the Liberia Revenue Authority (LRA).
The purpose is also to build a framework for analysis and learning, i.e. to follow up the results and risks at various levels in the contributions and to propose adjustments at the contribution and policy level.

The contribution is aimed at support to the Embassy of Sweden / Sida in the follow-up and monitoring of PFM reform in Liberia. During the course of the project FCG Sweden supports Sida in its dialogue and coordination effort with other donors and financing partners in the reform amongst other things through a dedicated consultant.

participating-org.narrative: Sida administrative activity implemented by procured partner

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: In 2019 support was focusing on familiarising the new FCG consultant with the main PFM programmes in Liberia and producing appraisals and assessments of project documents on the World Bank coordinated and sponsored PFMRISP. This involved advising on Sweden’s potential focus within the PFMRISP and assisting with drafting the Swedish engagement document. In 2020, support focused on supporting monitoring of the PFMRISP and the conduct of a PEFA for Liberia and reviewing documentation related to the implementation of the two major projects in the PFM area in Liberia: 1) the World Bank coordinated and sponsored PFMRISP and 2) the Swedish financed ODI project on improving the State Budget. This support has taken various forms, with FCG Sweden assisting in the September 2020 and March 2021 PFMRISP implementation monitoring mission and the Liberia PEFA 2020 mission, both undertaken by World Bank, also through both planned and ad-hoc activities such as: reviewing and commenting on ODI BSI concept notes for an embedded advisor in the Ministries of Health and Education and reviewing and commenting on the PEFA mission concept note and the draft PEFA report.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
